For those who have problem with GAME HAS NOT BEEN INSTALLED. it's because you download the skidrow version, and in all pesedit it's uses reloaded crack. So you need to enter registration code for the game

FOR 64BIT machine just copy the following line  and save as *.reg file

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeKONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeKONAMIPES2012]
"code"="7XFH-RLM2-ET5U-MWH5-RHFE"
"version"="1.01.0000"
"installdir"="%d"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeKONAMIPES2013]
"code"="E5DW-NHA5-RR9T-DLMH-A6NP"
"installdir"="G:\MY GAMES\PES 2013\"
"version"="1.00.0000"
